page.title: 20Cheriton Fitz Events
page.content: There are many events, occurrin annually or at fairly regular intervals(see also Recreational Clubs) The biennial{Carnival}(qv) started between the wars & revived in 1978.The street is closed for{Village Tea {Parties}celebrating Royal Jubilees or Weddings.There are Ploughing Matches, Drama,Horticultural,Gymkhana and Dog {Shows,}countless Bring & Buy,Jumble Sales, Coffee Mornings& Famine Lunches The Twinning Association held an ambitious and successful{Exhibition}of crafts and artifacts in 1984. {ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS:}C.F.Primary School:- Helen Bailey,Sophie Brown,Richard Charles,Jane Foxwell, Annabel Gard, Richard Gill,Bridget Gillard,Simon Gould,Marcus Lawrence, Esme Martin, Eddie Rundle,Nicola Webber,Andrew Stoakes & David Yeandle, Cheriton Fitzpaine WI,Editor:Mrs.M.Tasker.
